column4: Hello.  I need to create a bootable XP install disk (I currently do not have windows on my machine).  Anyone know of linux alternatives to WinToFlash?  unetbootin did not work.
I need a linux program to create a windows install flash drive (I only have ubuntu on my machine).
pretty difficult in linux, go to a windows computer and use the wintoflash it works wonderful, if the ISO or disc is a legit ms product.
install the xp in a virtual then make the flash.
